title: Drawing, "Hercules Hurls Lichas into the Sea", 1813
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of black chalk on light blue paper
inscribed: Inscribed: ercole getta lica nel mare.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Altar shown in background. Sea at left. Scared nymph shown.

Drawing, "Hercules Hurls Lichas into the Sea", 1813.
1813. Pen and brown ink over traces of black chalk on light blue paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3233.
